issue.title: [Java] Fix setValueCount in spitAndTransfer for variable width vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3194](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3194). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need to use the split length as the value count of the target vector. We are incorrectly using the value count of the current vector for the target vector
